lines.text: Well, when in Slobovia, do like the other Slobs do, I always say.
I've eaten so many icicles I'm twenty degrees cooler inside. Man, what I wouldn't give for a genuine 14-karat carrot.
All right, big boy, give me a large bunya hug.
[Hugs Bugs so hard he turns blue]
Wait a cotton-pickin' minute! Women don't chase men in America.
Oh, brother. Foist there's a long courtship. It starts like this. How do you do?
How do you do? The courtship is over. Now we make marriage.
Ain't I the little matchmaker, though?
Come out, Miwwicent, you cute wittle Slobovian wabbit.
Well, wooks aren't evewything, you know.

[to Bugs]
Large kiss me, big boy.
[Bugs grabs an active electric fan and jams it against her lips, which only demolish the fan]
Hmm, not bad for a beginner.
